description: two women wearing large hats seated the a boat cabin next to open doors and steps up to other figures--mostly women--seated above; one woman holding a parasol
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [(illegible)]; URC, in pencil: [L.B. 15 / 189]; on back, in pencil: [30], [01.0.24], [002216] and illegible inscription
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2006; sold in August for TNO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2006-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A LEPERE.]; LLC, in the print: [CABINE D\'UNE MOUCHE]; LLC, in pencil: [Cabine a bateau mouche]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]
title: On the Riverboat
